Text: Firm fixed price for WGL delivered gasJohn Can you get me a fixed price for the following volumes delivered to the WGL citygate for these months Dec MMBtu per month Jan MMBtu per month Feb MMBtu per month Mar MMBtu per month Thank you Todd Campbell Tiger Natural Gas Inc E st Street Suite J Tulsa OK Phone x

Winter pricingGood morning John When you get a free minute can you check to see if you have come up with any pricing on those winter deals we discussed last week I appreciate your time Thanks Todd Campbell Tiger Natural Gas Inc E st Street Suite J Tulsa OK Phone x

WGL Baseload for NovemberJohn Just a reminder that Tiger is still looking to baseload a piece of gas delivered to WGL on a firm basis for the remainder of November We are prepared to pay a premium above where Transco NNY prices are trading right now as of am on Nov We would be looking to do a volume of between day If we do finalize a deal we will either post an LC with you or prepay the entire amount by wire Thanks for you help Todd Campbell Tiger Natural Gas Inc E st Street Suite J Tulsa OK Phone x
